home.heading: Find behavioral health care that's right for you.
home.zipPrompt: Enter your zip code to find care near your area

_coloradoCrisisService.heading: If you’re experiencing crisis
_coloradoCrisisService.content: No matter what you’re going through, help is available. Call Colorado Crisis Services at 844-493-TALK (8255) or text TALK to 38255.

_iMatter.heading: Free therapy for youth
_iMatter.content: I Matter can connect youth 18 years of age and younger (21 years or younger if receiving special education services) with a therapist for up to 6 free and confidential counseling sessions.
_iMatter.cta: Visit IMatterColorado.org To find a therapist and schedule an appointment.

_bha.heading: Our committment to you
_bha.content: You’ll never need to create an account to use this service, and any personally identifiable information you share will be kept secure.
